title: New: GIANTS – Falling Feat. Wølffe
body:
Really enjoyed London duo **GIANTS** and their two debut track, featuring YADi and Keith Murray, unfortunately their third offering, the Josef Salvat featuring [Throwback](https://soundcloud.

com/believeingiants/throwback-feat-josef-salvat), dropped just as I was in full on dissertation mode. Anyway, glad I caught their fourth track, this time calling in the recently [Neon Gold](http://neongoldrecords.com/wolffe-shoot-you-down/) featured Wølffe for an elegant pop masterclass. Check out Falling below. Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.

Anyway, glad I caught their fourth track, this time calling in the recently Neon Gold featured Wølffe for an elegant pop masterclass. \[…\]
